shortdesc.i: This event is fired by the system. If you want to listen to the event you can do so using the document.addEventListener function and remove the listener using the document.removeEventListener function. The connectionchange event is triggered whenever the network connection type changes.

dd.p: The callback function that will be invoked on the connectionchange event.
An object with the pertinent information.
The network connection type prior to the event.

p.pre:
<script type="text/javascript">

    function onChange(info) {
        alert("The network connection type used to be: " + info.oldType + " and is now: " + info.newType);
    }

    document.addEventListener("connectionchange", onChange);

</script>
